src:
Campur Aduk, Perasaan Skuad Chelsea Usai Comeback Impresif Atas Ajax Amsterdam
07 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Christian Pulisic mengakui comeback Chelsea atas Ajax Amsterdam terbilang gila. Rabu (6/7/2019) dini hari WIB, The Blues berjuang dari kondisi tertinggal 1-4 hingga imbang 4-4, bahkan nyaris menang.
Pertandingan itu memang salah satu pertandingan terliar di ajang Liga Champions. Ajax tidak main-main sebagai tim tamu, mereka datang untuk menyerang, dan kali ini Chelsea jadi korbannya.
Pasukan Frank Lampard itu tertinggal 1-3 di babak pertama, lalu memburuk jadi 1-4 di babak kedua. Saat ini, sudah ada sebagian fans Chelsea yang meninggalkan Stamford Bridge lebih awal.
Mereka yang meninggalkan stadion inilah yang tidak beruntung, melewatkan salah satu comeback terbaik di Liga Champions.

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Mixture, Chelsea Squad Feelings After an Impressive Comeback Over Ajax Amsterdam
Nov 7 2019, 07:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Christian Pulisic admits Chelsea's comeback over Ajax Amsterdam is somewhat crazy. Wednesday (7/6/2019) early morning hrs, The Blues struggled from conditions behind 1-4 to draw 4-4, even almost won.
The match was indeed one of the wildest matches in the Champions League. Ajax did not play as a guest team, they came to attack, and this time Chelsea were the victims.
Frank Lampard's troops trailed 1-3 in the first round, then deteriorated to 1-4 in the second round. At present, there are already some Chelsea fans who left Stamford Bridge earlier.
Those who left the stadium were the unlucky ones, missing out on one of the best comeback in the Champions League.

Read below, Bolaneters!
